name: gulp-ruby-haml
description: Compile Haml to HTML with Ruby Haml

scripts.test: npm run-script style && npm run-script unit-test
scripts.style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js test/test.js && node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint index.js test/test.js
scripts.unit-test: if [ -d "tmp" ]; then if find tmp -mindepth 1 -print -quit | grep -q .; then rm tmp/*; fi; fi; mocha
